documentation.summary: Comprehensive email notification system for employee onboarding and asset allocation processes using Gmail SMTP integration with professional HTML templates.
documentation.description:
This MCP server provides automated email notification capabilities for HR and IT processes with enterprise-grade features: ## Key Features ### Professional Email Templates - **Employee Welcome Emails**: Branded onboarding emails with company information and next steps - **Asset Allocation Notifications**: Detailed equipment assignment confirmations with asset details - **Onboarding Complete Messages**: Comprehensive completion notifications with asset summaries - **Responsive Design**: Mobile-friendly HTML email templates with consistent branding - **Dynamic Content**: Template variables for personalized messaging ### Gmail SMTP Integration - **Secure SMTP Configuration**: Enterprise-grade Gmail SMTP integration with TLS encryption - **App Password Support**: Enhanced security using Gmail app passwords instead of account passwords - **Authentication Methods**: OAuth 2.0 and app password authentication support - **Delivery Tracking**: Email delivery status monitoring and error handling - **Rate Limiting**: Intelligent rate limiting to comply with Gmail sending limits ### Template Engine - **Velocity Templates**: Apache Velocity template engine for dynamic content generation - **Variable Substitution**: Support for complex data structures and conditional logic - **Template Inheritance**: Base templates with customizable sections - **Localization Support**: Multi-language template support with resource bundles - **Template Validation**: Pre-send template validation and error checking ## API Endpoints ### Core Notification Operations - `/mcp/tools/send-welcome-email` - Send employee welcome notification with onboarding information - `/mcp/tools/send-asset-notification` - Send asset allocation confirmation with device details - `/mcp/tools/send-onboarding-complete` - Send completion notification with process summary - `/mcp/tools/send-bulk-notification` - Send bulk notifications to multiple recipients ### Configuration and Testing - `/mcp/tools/test-email-config` - Test Gmail SMTP configuration and connectivity - `/mcp/tools/validate-template` - Validate email template syntax and variables - `/mcp/tools/preview-email` - Generate email preview without sending - `/mcp/tools/get-delivery-status` - Check email delivery status and metrics ### Template Management - `/mcp/tools/list-templates` - List available email templates - `/mcp/tools/get-template` - Retrieve specific template content - `/mcp/tools/update-template` - Update template content (admin only) ## Email Templates ### Welcome Email Template ```html Welcome to ${companyName}

Welcome ${firstName}!

We're excited to have you join our ${department} team as a ${position}.

Your start date is ${startDate}. Your manager ${manager} will contact you shortly.

``` ### Asset Allocation Template ```html

Asset Allocation Confirmation

Dear ${firstName},

The following assets have been allocated to you:

    #foreach($asset in $assets)
  • ${asset.category}: ${asset.brand} ${asset.model} (Tag: ${asset.assetTag})
    • #end

Please take care of these assets and report any issues immediately.

``` ## Configuration ### Gmail SMTP Configuration ```properties # Gmail SMTP Settings gmail.smtp.host=smtp.gmail.com gmail.smtp.port=587 gmail.smtp.auth=true gmail.smtp.starttls.enable=true gmail.username=${GMAIL_USERNAME} gmail.password=${secure::GMAIL_APP_PASSWORD} # Email Defaults email.from.name=${COMPANY_NAME} HR Team email.from.address=${GMAIL_USERNAME} email.reply.to=${HR_EMAIL} ``` ### Template Configuration ```properties # Template Engine Settings template.engine=velocity template.encoding=UTF-8 template.cache.enabled=true template.validation.enabled=true # Template Locations template.welcome=templates/employee-welcome.html template.asset=templates/asset-allocation.html template.complete=templates/onboarding-complete.html ``` ### Notification Recipients ```properties # Default Recipients notification.cc.hr=${HR_EMAIL} notification.cc.it=${IT_EMAIL} notification.cc.manager=${MANAGER_EMAIL} # Notification Rules notification.welcome.cc=hr notification.asset.cc=hr,it notification.complete.cc=hr,manager ``` ## Security Features ### Credential Management - **Secure Properties**: Gmail credentials stored using MuleSoft secure property placeholder - **Environment Variables**: Support for environment-based configuration - **Credential Rotation**: Easy credential rotation without application restart - **Access Control**: Role-based access to sensitive configuration ### Email Security - **TLS Encryption**: All SMTP communications encrypted using TLS 1.2+ - **Authentication**: Multiple authentication methods (OAuth 2.0, App Passwords) - **Input Validation**: Comprehensive email address and content validation - **Sanitization**: HTML content sanitization to prevent injection attacks ### Privacy and Compliance - **GDPR Compliance**: Support for data privacy regulations - **Audit Logging**: Complete audit trail of all email notifications - **Data Retention**: Configurable email log retention policies - **Opt-out Support**: Unsubscribe and preference management ## Monitoring and Observability ### Performance Metrics - **Email Delivery Rates**: Track successful vs. failed deliveries - **Response Times**: Monitor SMTP response times and throughput - **Template Rendering**: Performance metrics for template processing - **Error Rates**: Comprehensive error tracking and categorization ### Health Checks - **SMTP Connectivity**: Continuous monitoring of Gmail SMTP connection - **Template Validation**: Regular validation of email templates - **Credential Health**: Monitoring of authentication status - **Queue Status**: Email queue depth and processing status ### Alerting - **Delivery Failures**: Immediate alerts for email delivery failures - **Authentication Issues**: Alerts for Gmail authentication problems - **Rate Limiting**: Notifications when approaching Gmail sending limits - **Template Errors**: Alerts for template rendering failures ## Integration Capabilities ### MCP Protocol Support - **Full MCP Compliance**: Complete Model Context Protocol implementation - **Agent Fabric Integration**: Seamless coordination with other MCP servers - **Event-Driven Architecture**: Real-time notification triggering - **Orchestration Support**: Integration with workflow orchestrators ### External System Integration - **HR Information Systems**: Employee data synchronization for personalization - **Asset Management Systems**: Asset details integration for notifications - **Identity Providers**: Single sign-on integration for template management - **CRM Systems**: Contact management and preference synchronization - **Monitoring Systems**: Integration with enterprise monitoring platforms ## Template Variables ### Employee Variables - `${firstName}`, `${lastName}` - Employee name components - `${email}` - Employee email address - `${employeeId}` - Unique employee identifier - `${department}` - Department assignment - `${position}` - Job title/position - `${startDate}` - Employment start date - `${manager}` - Manager name and contact information ### Asset Variables - `${assets}` - Collection of allocated assets - `${asset.category}` - Asset type (laptop, phone, etc.) - `${asset.brand}` - Asset manufacturer - `${asset.model}` - Asset model name - `${asset.assetTag}` - Unique asset identifier - `${asset.specifications}` - Technical specifications ### Company Variables - `${companyName}` - Organization name - `${companyAddress}` - Company address - `${hrEmail}` - HR contact email - `${itEmail}` - IT support email - `${companyLogo}` - Logo URL for branding ## Business Rules ### Email Routing Rules - **Welcome Emails**: Sent to employee with CC to HR and manager - **Asset Notifications**: Sent to employee with CC to HR and IT - **Completion Emails**: Sent to employee, manager, HR, and IT - **Error Notifications**: Sent to system administrators ### Delivery Policies - **Retry Logic**: Exponential backoff for failed deliveries - **Rate Limiting**: Respect Gmail API quotas and limits - **Priority Queuing**: High-priority notifications processed first - **Duplicate Prevention**: Prevent duplicate notifications ## Integration Patterns Designed to integrate with: - Employee onboarding and offboarding systems - HR information systems (HRIS) - IT asset management platforms - Customer relationship management (CRM) systems - Enterprise service management tools - Business process automation platforms - Identity and access management systems
